mean_cn: n. 美国（美利坚合众国）
mean_en: North American republic containing 50 states - 48 conterminous states in North America plus Alaska in northwest North America and the Hawaiian Islands in the Pacific Ocean; achieved independence in 1776
sentence: The Statue of Liberty is located in New York City, USA.
sentence_trans: 自由女神像位于美国纽约。
